mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Material ( omr_notifi_no, model_id, serial_no, ocm, ocm_rank, level, direct_flg, ocm_deliver_date, osh_deliver_date, customer_id, agreed_date, scheduled_date, service_repair_flg, fix_type, reception_time, selectable, area, bound_out_ocm, break_back_flg, scheduled_manager_comment ) VALUES ( #{sorc_no}, #{model_id}, #{serial_no}, #{ocm}, #{ocm_rank}, #{level}, #{direct_flg}, #{ocm_deliver_date}, #{osh_deliver_date}, #{customer_id}, #{agreed_date}, #{scheduled_date}, #{service_repair_flg}, #{fix_type}, Now(), #{selectable}, #{area}, #{bound_out_ocm}, #{break_back_flg}, #{scheduled_manager_comment} );
mapper.update: UPDATE Material SET omr_notifi_no = #{sorc_no}, model_id = #{model_id}, serial_no = #{serial_no}, ocm = #{ocm}, ocm_rank = #{ocm_rank}, customer_id = #{customer_id}, ocm_deliver_date = #{ocm_deliver_date}, osh_deliver_date = #{osh_deliver_date}, level = #{level}, direct_flg = #{direct_flg}, service_repair_flg = #{service_repair_flg}, selectable = #{selectable}, fix_type = #{fix_type}, area = #{area}, bound_out_ocm = #{bound_out_ocm} WHERE material_id = #{material_id};
mapper.select:
SELECT material_id from Material where (omr_notifi_no = #{sorc_no})
AND break_back_flg = 0 AND outline_time IS NULL;
SELECT material_id from Material where model_id = #{model_id} and serial_no = #{serial_no} AND outline_time IS NULL;

SELECT a.reception_time, (select name from model where model_id = a.model_id) as model_name, a.serial_no,a.ocm,(select name from operator where operator_id = b.operator_id) as operator_name, a.direct_flg,a.service_repair_flg,a.fix_type FROM material a, production_feature b where a.material_id = b.material_id and b.position_id = 9 and a.break_back_flg = 0 and b.action_time > current_date order by reception_time
mapper.update: UPDATE Material SET ocm_shipping_date = #{ocm_shipping_date} where (omr_notifi_no = #{sorc_no}) AND ocm_shipping_date IS NULL; -- AND break_back_flg = 0
mapper.select: SELECT omr_notifi_no as sorc_no,agreed_date,level,fix_type FROM Material WHERE inline_time is null AND break_back_flg = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE Material SET agreed_date = #{agreed_date}, scheduled_date = CASE WHEN scheduled_expedited = 0 THEN #{scheduled_date} ELSE scheduled_date END, level = coalesce(#{level}, level) where omr_notifi_no = #{sorc_no}
